Actions.Name: Wicked Slice
Effects: Dash 1 before and after the attack.

Actions.Name: Vile
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 is slowed, and must save or take take 1 piercing damage for each space they move until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Foul Play
Actions.Description: Teleport 3, then deal [D] to an adjacent foe. Can repeat this effect, but must choose a different foe each time unless no other foes are in range, or this effect has triggered four times.
